[0][11111111][00000000000000000000001]
[1][11111111][11111111111111111111111]

if the exponent bits is all one and the fraction bits
is not zero, then f represent NaN
=====================================================
infinity
[0][11111111][00000000000000000000000]
[1][11111111][00000000000000000000000]
=====================================================
normalized
[0][00000001][00000000000000000000000]
[0][11111110][11111111111111111111111]
[1][00000001][00000000000000000000000]
[1][11111110][11111111111111111111111]
=====================================================
denormalized
[0][00000000][00000000000000000000000]
[0][00000000][11111111111111111111111]
[1][00000000][00000000000000000000000]
[1][00000000][11111111111111111111111]
